General.Name: Dialog Group Bhd
General.Description: Dialog Group Berhad, an investment holding company, provides integrated technical services to the upstream, midstream, and downstream sectors in the oil, gas, and petrochemical industries worldwide. It offers logistics assets and other services, including tank terminals and supply bases; and upstream assets and services. The company also provides engineering, procurement, construction, commissioning, and fabrication services, such as feasibility, conceptual design, and detailed engineering; and plant maintenance, shutdowns, and turnarounds services for refineries, and gas, and chemical plants, as well as tank cleaning and repair, and catalyst handling services. In addition, it designs, fabricates, and supplies pressure vessels, columns, and reactors; storage tanks, spheres, and bullet tanks; shell and tube heat exchangers; pipe spool and pipe racks; process skids and modules; and upstream offshore products. Further, the company provides digital technology and solutions comprising asset management systems, DIALOG intelligent planning systems, welding control systems, oil and stock information system, and corporate and productivity solutions; and solutions and services in relation to e-money and cashless payments. Additionally, it engages in letting out and management of properties; markets specialty chemicals, catalysts, process material handling services, absorbents, petroleum additives, drilling base oil, and specialty equipment; develops industrial estates; and offers logistics, marine operation, technical consulting, technical, hookup and debottlenecking, electrical and instrumentation, calibration, consultancy and administration, stainless steel fabrication, power pylon painting, profile cutting, mechanical work, and information technology support services, as well as property development. Dialog Group Berhad was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
